content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
- Stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5), transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5), and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using inserter entities without source items
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items before using them.
### Errors when using furnace entities without ingredients
- Ensure that furnace entities have ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that steam engine is connected to the electric network before using it.
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
- Ensure that pipe group has fluid before using it.
### Errors when using electricity group without plug
- Ensure that electricity group is plugged into the electric network before using it.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No variables have been assigned.
